content.question: Which of the following intervals is a whole step?

choices.label: The figure presents two quarter notes in bass clef. The pitches of the notes are C4 and B3.
The figure presents two quarter notes in bass clef. The pitches of the notes are C4 and B-flat 3.
The figure presents two quarter notes in bass clef. The pitches of the notes are C-flat 4 and B3.
The figure presents two quarter notes in bass clef. The pitches of the notes are C-sharp 4 and B-flat 3.

content.answer: The figure presents two quarter notes in bass clef. The pitches of the notes are C4 and B-flat 3.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in notated music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
